      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:S182_8</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>S182_8</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Studying mammals: life in the trees</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studieren der Säugetiere: Leben in den 
Bäumen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étudier des mammifères : la vie dans les 
arbres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudando mamíferos: vida nas árvores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studiare i mammiferi: vita negli alberi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελέτη των θηλαστικών: ζωή στα δέντρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estudiar mamíferos: vida en los árboles</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">David Attenborough looks at ‘life in the trees’: examining how species have evolved to cope with arboreal living. You will learn how lemurs, anteaters, bears and many others have developed different methods to help movement and survival.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Adaptation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">adaptive_radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">coevolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Evolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">herbivores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">locomotion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">mammals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">niche_separation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">predators</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">David Attenborough betrachtet?life in den 
Bäumen?: überprüfen, wie Sorten entwickelt haben, um mit 
arboreal Leben fertig zu werden. Sie erlernen, wie lemurs, 
anteaters, Bären und viele andere unterschiedliche Methoden 
entwickelt haben, um Bewegung und Überleben zu helfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">David Attenborough regarde le ?life dans les arbres
? : examinant comment les espèces ont évolué pour faire 
face à la vie arborescent. Vous apprendrez comment les lemurs, 
les anteaters, les ours et beaucoup d'autres ont développé 
différentes méthodes pour aider le mouvement et la survie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">David Attenborough olha o?life nas árvores?: 
examinando como as espécies evoluíram para lidar com a vida 
arboreal. Você aprenderá como os lemurs, os anteaters, os 
ursos e muitos outros desenvolveram métodos diferentes para ajudar ao
movimento e à sobrevivência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">David Attenborough guarda il?life negli alberi?: 
esaminando come le specie si sono evolute per fare fronte alla 
vita arboreal. Imparerete come i lemurs, i anteaters, gli orsi e
molti altri hanno messo a punto i metodi differenti per aiutare il 
movimento e la sopravvivenza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Δαβίδ Attenborough εξετάζει ?life στα δέντρα;: 
εξετάζοντας πώς τα είδη έχουν εξελιχθεί για να 
αντιμετωπίσουν τη δενδρική διαβίωση. Θα μάθετε πώς 
lemurs, τα anteaters, αντέχουν και πολλά άλλα έχουν 
αναπτύξει τις διαφορετικές μεθόδους για να βοηθήσουν τη 
μετακίνηση και την επιβίωση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">David Attenborough mira el?life en los árboles?: 
examinando cómo las especies se han desarrollado para hacer 
frente a la vida arbórea. Usted aprenderá cómo los lemurs, 
los anteaters, los osos y muchos otros han desarrollado diversos 
métodos para ayudar al movimiento y a la supervivencia.</string>
          </description>
